item.title: Cool kids pop a programmers calc in their demos
item.description: Over time, I’ve heard several well-respected security professionals mention that you’re not really cool unless you can pop a scientific/programmer’s calculator when demoing your exploits. I mean, what right does a standard, run of the mill calculator have showing its face to a crowd of enthralled conference attendees watching the
